docs.title: Welcome!
docs.text: Welcome to my site! I look forward to sharing technical knowledge with you.

docs.title: Kyverno Resource Cleanup Rules
docs.text: Using a new beta feature of Kyverno, you can delete resources you wish to expire.

docs.title: Azure Private Endpoints and Terraform
docs.text: Cover how to create private private endpoints with Terraform.

docs.title: Terraform Cloud - Why?
docs.text: Learn what is the value proposition for Terraform Cloud.

docs.title: Long Lived Branch Development with Terraform and Terraform Cloud
docs.text: Using Terraform workspaces in Terraform cloud along with git branches, learn how to keep your code DRY.
